title: 6 Easy Steps to Log Into Blogger + Troubleshooting Tips

steps.title: Go to https://www.blogger.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.blogger.com in a web browser. You can use a desktop or mobile browser.

steps.title: Click SIGN IN.
steps.content: Click SIGN IN . This is at the top-right corner. If you don't see this button, you can use the direct sign-in address .

steps.title: Enter your Google account email.
steps.content: Enter your Google account email. If you have a Google account already saved onto your browser, you'll find it here. If you don't, enter your email address now. If you don't see your email address listed, click Use another account . You must have a Google account to use Blogger. If you don't have one, you can create one for free.

steps.title: Press Next.
steps.content: Press Next . This is the blue button.

steps.title: Type your password and click Next.
steps.content: Type your password and click Next . If you don't remember your password, you'll need to recover it . You'll be logged into Blogger.

steps.title: Use Blogger.
steps.content: Use Blogger. You should see your home page. If you don't have a blog yet, you can create one .

steps.title: Make sure you're using the right account.
steps.content: Make sure you're using the right account. Blogger allows multiple accounts to be logged in at once, so double-check the email is correct.

steps.title: Reset your password.
steps.content: Reset your password. If you can't log in to Blogger due to a forgotten password, click Forgot password? on the Google login screen to start the reset process.

steps.title: Use https://www.blogger.com/forgot.g if you forgot your email.
steps.content: Use https://www.blogger.com/forgot.g if you forgot your email. Enter your URL into the first field, and then click Lookup to see a hint of which email address was used. [1] X Research source If you don't remember your username or blog name, enter your email address in the bottom field and click Lookup .

steps.title: Contact other administrators.
steps.content: Contact other administrators. If your blog has more than one administrator, try contacting them to be added as an administrator using an email you can access.
